overview: The story will begin with the suicide of a finance man on a golf course. After the death of the banker, the chain effect will lead to the emergence of the true social natures of the elite class. A journey from the most humble to the most powerful, and like all of them, deep down, they are made of the same material. A social film that offers a different approach to the components of life in society.
title: 2014 Hijos de puta
